document.full_text: at the end of april, mr. obama was a slight favorite to win re-election; after the killing of bin laden, his odds were only marginally better.
document.title: letter from washington: obama hasn't won a 2nd term yet
lines_and_colors: at the end of april, mr. obama was a slight favorite to win re-election; after the killing of bin laden, his odds were only marginally better.
